department: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada
procurement_category: Competitive - Open bidding, SRVTGD, GD, CNST
short_summary: Maintenance, installation & support services for security systems
description: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada is seeking maintenance, installation and support services for electronic security systems in various locations. The contract is expected to last for 3 years and will require significant experience and knowledge of electronic security systems. The expected contract start date is November 1, 2022, and the expected contract end date is March 31, 2025.
